text: The Foundation stone will be laid for the new Courts complex in Ruwanwella on 10th March under the patronage of the Minister of Justice Wijayadasa Rajapaksha. The Courts complex to be built at a cost of Rs. 275 million will resolves the space problems faced by the people for a long time within the current courts premises.The new building complex will consist of Magistrate Courts, District Courts, Documentation Centers, and Lawyers offices.
title: New Courts complex for Ruwanwella
